in cook it for about 45 seconds to a
minute and we can eat and it would be

problem is when you're working with a

it's not easy to get that timing exact
and the problem is after a few minutes
these
things turn from beautifully tender to
extremely rubberband ish so we're going
to be going with a second method which
simply means to let this simmer gently
